articles.author: Sam Medley
articles.title: MacOS 10.15.5 to include new battery management tool to increase battery lifespan - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: MacOS 10.15.5 Catalina will bring a new battery health tool that can reduce the maximum charge of a MacBook's lithium-ion battery. The tool aims to lengthen the overall longevity of a laptop's battery, but it may reduce battery life between recharges.
articles.content:
The next update for macOS 10.15.5 Catalina will be a boon for those that plan on holding onto their MacBooks for a long time. The next version of macOS 10.15.5 will include a new tool that will help lengthen the overall lifespan of a lithium-ion battery.
The… [+1118 chars]
